oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kitāb Munyat al-muftī / taṣnīf al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻĀlim al-Fāḍil al-ʻAllāmah Jamāl al-Dīn Muftī al-muslimīn Yūsuf ibn Abī Asʻad ibn Aḥmad al-Sijistānī. manuscript, 1481
Munyat al-muftī
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sijistānī, Yūsuf ibn Aḥmad , active 1240
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم وبالله التوفيق والاعانة وهو حسبي ونعم الوكيل الحمد لله الواحد ... :Incipit
Written in one column, 27-29 lines per page, in black with important words/sentences and punctuation in red.
According to colophon (f. 117r), copy completed on 11 Ṣafar 886 AH [April 11, 1481 AD].
Ownership statement signed Muḥammad al-J.q.lī. Purchase statement by Muḥammad Anīs Ṭālawī from the estate of the Muḥammad al-J.q.lī.
MS Arab 355. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Islamic law
Hanafites
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: منية المفتي
كتاب منية المفتي / تصنيف الشيخ الامام العالم الفاضل العلامة جمال الدين مفتي المسلمين يوسف بن ابي اسعد بن احمد السجستاني : مخطوطة، 1481
